Verses: 1 pinbu Naan Kadarkarai Manalinmel Nindren. Appozhudhu Samuththiraththilirundhu Oru Mirugam Ezhumbivarak Kanden; Adharku Ezhu Thalaigalum Paththukkombugalum Irundhana; Adhin Kombugalinmel Paththu Mudigalum, Adhin Thalaigalinmel Thooshanamaana Naamamum Irundhana.

2 naan Kanda Mirugam Siruththaiyaippolirundhadhu; Adhin Kaalgal Karadiyin Kaalgalaippolavum, Adhin Vaai Singaththin Vaayaippolavum Irundhana; Valusarppamaanadhu Than Balaththaiyum Than Singaasanaththaiyum Migundha Adhigaaraththaiyum Adharkuk Koduththadhu.

3 adhin Thalaigalilondru Saavukkedhuvaaik Kaayappattirukkak Kanden; Aanaalum Saavukkedhuvaana Andhak Kaayam Sosthamaakkappattadhu. Boomiyilulla Yaavarum Aachchariyaththode Andha Mirugaththaip Pinpatri,

4 andha Mirugaththirku Appadippatta Adhigaarangoduththa Valusarppaththai Vananginaargal. Allaamalum: Mirugaththirku Oppaanavan Yaar? Adhinode Yuththampannaththakkavan Yaar? Endru Solli, Mirugaththaiyum Vananginaargal.
5 perumaiyaanavaigalaiyum Thooshanangalaiyum Pesum Vaai Adharkuk Kodukkappattadhu; Allaamalum, Naarpaththirandu Maadham Yuththampanna Adharku Adhigaarang Kodukkappattadhu.
6 adhu Dhevanaith Thooshikkumpadi Than Vaayaith Thirandhu, Avarudaiya Naamaththaiyum, Avarudaiya Vaasasthalaththaiyam, Paralogaththil Vaasamaayirukkiravargalaiyum Thooshiththadhu.

7 melum, Parisuththavaangalode Yuththampanni Avargalai Jeyikkumpadikku Adharku Adhigaarangodukkappattadhumallaamal, Ovvoru Koththiraththinmelum Baashaikkaarar Melum Jaadhigalmelum Adharku Adhikaarangodukkappattadhu.
8 ulagaththotramudhal Adikkappatta Aattukkuttiyinudaiya Jeevapusthakaththil Perezhudhappattiraadha Boomiyin Kudigal Yaavarum Adhai Vananguvaargal.
10 siraippaduththikkondu Pogiravan Siraippattuppovaan; Pattayaththinaale Kollugiravan Pattayaththinaale Kollappadavendum. Parisuththavaankaludaiya Porumaiyum Visuvaasamum Idhile Vilangum.
11 pinbu, Veroru Mirugam Boomiyilirundhu Ezhumbak Kanden; Adhu Aattukkuttikku Oppaaga Irandu Kombugalaiyudaiyadhaayirundhu, Valusarppaththaippolap Pesinadhu.

12 adhu Mundhina Mirugaththin Adhigaaram Muzhuvadhaiyum Adhin Munbaaga Nadappiththu, Saavukkedhuvaana Kaayam Aarach Sosthamadaindha Mundhina Mirugaththaip Boomiyum Adhin Kudigalum Vanangumpadi Seydhadhu.
13 andriyum, Adhu Manusharukkumunpaaga Vaanaththilirundhu Boomiyinmel Akkiniyai Irangappannaththakkadhaagap Periya Arpudhangalai Nadappiththu,

14 mirugaththinmunbaaga Andha Arpudhangalaich Seyyumpadi Thanakkuk Kodukkappatta Saththuvaththinaale Boomiyin Kudigalai Mosampokki, Pattayaththinaale Kaayappattup Pizhaiththa Mirugaththirku Oru Soroobam Pannavendumendru Boomiyin Kudigalukkuch Sollitru.

15 melum Ammirugaththin Soroobam Pesaththakkadhaagavum, Mirugaththin Soroobaththai Vanangaadha Yaavaraiyum Kolaiseyyaththakkadhaagavum, Mirugaththin Soroobaththirku Aaviyaik Kodukkumpadi Adharkuch Saththuvangodukkappattadhu.
16 adhu Siriyor, Periyor, Aisuvariyavaangal, Thariththirar, Suyaadheenar, Adimaigal, Ivargal Yaavarum Thangal Thangal Valadhukaigalilaavadhu Netrigalilaavadhu Oru Muththiraiyaip Perumpadikkum,

17 andha Mirugaththin Muththiraiyaiyaavadhu Adhin Naamaththaiyaavadhu Adhin Naamaththin Ilakkaththaiyaavadhu Thariththukkollugiravan Thavira Veroruvanum Kollavum Virkavung Koodaadhapadikkum Seydhadhu.
18 idhile Gnaanam Vilangum; Andha Mirugaththin Ilakkaththaip Puththiyudaiyavan Kanakkuppaarkkakkadavan; Adhu Manusharudaiya Ilakkamaayirukkiradhu; Adhinudaiya Ilakkam Arunootrarupaththaaru.
